com.camerontec.util.io

Interface IBytesSegmentExternalizer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The concrete type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanToBytesSegmentExternalizer, BytesSegmentExternalizerBase, BytesSegmentToBytesSegmentExternalizer, ConcurrentStreamingBytesSegmentExternalizerBase, CopyFreeBytesSegmentToBytesSegmentExternalizer, DoubleToBytesSegmentExternalizer, FloatToBytesSegmentExternalizer, IntegerToBytesSegmentExternalizer, LongToBytesSegmentExternalizer, MutableIntegerToBytesSegmentExternalizer, MutableLongToBytesSegmentExternalizer, ObjectToBytesSegmentExternalizer, RecoveryRecordBytesSegmentExternalizer, RoutingTableRecord.Externalizer, ShortToBytesSegmentExternalizer, StringUTFToBytesSegmentExternalizer

    public interface IBytesSegmentExternalizer<T>
extends Serializable
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of serializing/deserializing objects to/from BytesSegments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T fromBytesSegment(BytesSegment source)
      Create an object by deserializing the specified BytesSegment.
      BytesSegment toBytesSegment(T object, BytesSegment target)
      Serialize the specified object to its BytesSegment representation.

    • Method Detail

      • toBytesSegment

        BytesSegment toBytesSegment(T object,
                            BytesSegment target)
                     throws BytesSegmentExternalizationException
        Serialize the specified object to its BytesSegment representation.
        Parameters:
        object - The object.
        target - The target segment. If the wrapped byte array is not large enough to accommodate the serialized representation of object the behavior is implementation dependent.
        Returns:
        The serialized representation of the specified object.
        Throws:
        BytesSegmentExternalizationException - On serialization error.

      • fromBytesSegment

        T fromBytesSegment(BytesSegment source)
            throws BytesSegmentExternalizationException
        Create an object by deserializing the specified BytesSegment.

        Note that it is expected that the concrete implementation knows how to create objects of the specified type.

        Parameters:
        source - The source segment.
        Returns:
        The concrete object.
        Throws:
        BytesSegmentExternalizationException - On error deserialization error.
